text: British Guiana (now Guyana) competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London, England. Four competitors, all men, took part in seven events in three sports. It was the first time that the nation competed at the Olympic Games. ==Athletics== ==Cycling== One cyclist represented British Guiana in 1948. ;Individual road race * Laddie Lewis ;Sprint * Laddie Lewis ;Time trial * Laddie Lewis ==Weightlifting== ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1948 Summer Olympics 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Sport in British Guiana Summer Olympics
title: British Guiana at the 1948 Summer Olympics
